name: Flowery Vale
summary: Flowery Vale is a match 3 garden fantasy where you must gather flowers for your sweetheart. Lose yourself in the stunning beauty of nature as you gather daisies, roses and more in order to decorate your girlfriend's cabin in the woods. Fill baskets with certain blossoms before time runs out, produce a set number of combos or create a certain number of explosions. There's never a dull moment as you create botanical delights to charm your beloved.
